Merge pull request #95 from Johndeep/master

Code cleaning, refactoring improvements etc.
set 'already read' color a little bit darker and move setText into else block, because it isn't needed to be called twice.

change longer if-else statements into switch and fixed some strange line wrapping

change doInBackground method so that it call publishProgress() instead of onProgressUpdate(). This will prevent some crashes, especially during heavy parallel downloads.

solve L2R finishing problem, until this patch, if you read L2R then the manga is not marked as read and can save strange numbers like '33/32' (33 from 32). Now it marks L2R as read properly.

fixed some strange line wrapping and made use of some switch instead of if-else
Fixed translation and description misunderstanding and removed the '(x is standard)' text.
Fix one letter in previous commit.

renamed extended Async methods to '<name>Task', so we know which one is a background task and which one is a normal method. Translated some names to english by the way (I'm sorry, but this would help in reading very much, I tried to translate it as simple as it goes). The variable usually starts with small letter, but the methods name are the same with big letter, which can be confusing, I tried to differ the name a bit.

Rewrote some Comments for better understanding.

All in all, no change in functional code.
Small fix in layout, rearrange ListView chapter menu

Merge pull request #1 from raulhaag/master

merge for myself

Change directory of database to what you set in preference.

WARINING! The database, which is stored in data/data before, won't be recognized anymore, you have to move them manually into the directory, which you set in preference, if you want to preserve your database.

But with this, your manga database will then be untouched by uninstalling the app.
Clean up the lazylist lib a bit. Refactored and renamed some methods for clearer understanding. Add some comments for easier understanding.

Merge pull request #121 from Johndeep/master

Quick little enhancement of dark theme
added fade in animation on image load
Fixed starting sort view, clean up code

* Add new SeekBar for more configure variety. Do not worry, NumPicker is untouched, just unused.
* Fixed SeekBar style, should only apply to ActivityLector.
* Fix dimension and sizing of NumberPicker and SeekBar Dialog, make use of xml, so either on tablet and on phone it looks the same. NumberPicker also looks better now.

* add separate coloring of reader mode, i.e. if you like Orange, but want dark Green in the reader mode instead, because Orange would be too bright.
* rename many variables for better reading.
* minor comments
Better use setBackgroundColor instead of setBackground and setBackgroundDrawable, because we only want to set the color. So we don't need to be careful about deprecations.
fix some translations, remove commented background settings (it works successfully on API 15 and 22), fix some metrics of dialogs (some margins)
optimize coloring, especially for dark theme, if using dark color in dark theme, text stays mostly readable
